import React from 'react' import {Image, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import data from '../data' function Story() { return ( {data.stories.map(story => (

{story.title}

{story.author.name}
{story.community.name}

{story.created} | {story.readTime} Read {story.hashtags}

{story.content}

{story.author.name}

{story.created}

{story.community.name}

{story.content}

{story.author.name}

{story.created}

{story.community.name}
))} ) } export default Story
